It common diabetic patient treat Chinese herbal medicine China currently , therapeutic effect publish international journal . In study , evaluate whether Chinese herbal medicine , YH1 , enhance glycemic control safe add-on medication poorly control type 2 diabetes patient . A total 80 poorly control type 2 diabetes patient glycohemoglobin ≥ 9 % Endocrinology Metabolism clinic Internal Chinese Medicine clinic enrol randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial . Subjects randomly assign receive either YH1 ( 6 g ) placebo three time per day 12 consecutive week . All subject group also continuously receive oral hypoglycemic agent without dose medicine change . During 12-week period , glycohemoglobin , fast plasma glucose , 2h postprandial glucose , waist circumference , body weight , body mass index assess . In addition , insulin resistance , β -cell function , lipid profile , liver renal function also evaluate . Independent statisticians perform data analysis end trial .
